Title: Normal - .Net Object Relational Mapping Application Library
Description:
Normal is a lightweight ORM library that uses reflection and attributes to make easier to mapping objects to tables and properties to columns.

It's tested in Microsoft SQL Server 2000, 2005 and Firebird SQL 2.0.1 but can support other databases such as Oracle and MySQL.

Also contains some helper classes to easier map properties with WinForms Controls and WebForm Controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Normal is a lightweight ORM library that uses reflection and attributes to make easier to mapping objects to tables and properties to columns.

It's tested in Microsoft SQL Server 2000, 2005 and Firebird SQL 2.0.1 but can support other databases such as Oracle and MySQL.

Also contains some helper classes to easier map properties with WinForms Controls and WebForm Controls.

The release 0.1 released the simple CRUD operations.

The release 0.2 released the "horizontal FK mapping" feature for the entities (on demmand).

The release 0.3 released the "set FK mapping" feature for the entities (on demmand).

The release 0.4 aims to make performance tweaks such as "on demmand fields"

Tutorial
  1. Basic O/R Mapping
  2. Simple CRUD Operations
    1. Inserting Records

  3. Using Normal in Asp.Net Grid

  6. Using Normal with stored-procedures
